Articles.Content: I\'ve made a few posts hyere and there but i\'ve never actually introduced myself, so I\'m doing so now I\'m quite new (started with .16) but i have quickly gotten the hang of things. i have mad a few successful Mun landings and many not so successful I\'ve lost kerbals to failed rockets and from missing my mark (and then getting stuck orbiting the sun) and some from just random mishaps, but most have made it safely back down to be sent back up again well thats my intro. Nice to meet you all and any tips are welcome. Happy Flying!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
